job.title: Software Engineer, Home Services
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brThe people here at Apple dont just craft products  they build the kind of wonder thats revolutionized entire industries We believe that its the diversity of those people and their ideas that encourage the innovation that runs through everything we do from amazing technology to industryleading privacy and environmental efforts Join Apple and help us leave the world better than we found it  brbrbrWe are seeking an enthusiastic software developer to join our Home Services team Come investigate emerging technologies and develop nextgeneration products The ideal candidate thrives in ambiguity and is passionate about creating new products with meaningful and disruptive impact to the worldbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brExperience building large scale distributed software systemsbrbrExperience with data aggregation and third party data integrationsbrbrExperience with new product development while working in a highly crossfunctional environmentbrbrExperience launching new web services or data pipelines from the ground upbrbrExperience with objectoriented analysis and design with languages like JavabrbrExperience with Relational and NoSQL DatabasesbrbrPassion for people code and improving our futurebrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brAs part of the Home Services Engineering team you will have the opportunity to explore and contribute to Apple goals of building a better future You will be responsible for early development investigations prototypes and third party integrations The work will evolve over time to building robust highly scalable services that support millions of users Every day you will work with passionate problem solvers designing and building impactful bestinclass services for one of Apples most innovative spacesbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS or MS Computer Science or related technical field equivalent work experience will be consideredbrbr brstrongAdditional Requirementsbrstrong brApple is an Equal Opportunity Employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity We also take affirmative action to offer employment and advancement opportunities to all applicants including minorities women protected veterans and individuals with disabilities   brbrbrApple will not discriminate or retaliate against applicants who inquire about disclose or discuss their compensation or that of other applicants  brbrbrWe promote innovation and new technology to further improve our creative output Dynamic smart people and inspiring innovative technologies are the norm here You will be part of building an extraordinary team Were looking for a hardworking and passionate person to join this amazing team if you feel this is you wed love to hear from youbrbr brRole Number 200278885brbr
